name: UrgeSurvivalDEMO
description: Urge Survival is a Top-Down zombie shooter, it includes a good story and rich attention to detail when it comes to blood and gore. You play as a man named Nick who just found out theirs a very contagious virus going around. He tries to stay in a hotel when he receives this news, but has to quickly escape in his old truck. His mission is to find his grand daughter; nothing in the world will stop him from doing so, stay sharp!
